Package ie.gmit.sw.query

Class QueryString

java.lang.Object
ie.gmit.sw.query.QueryString
All Implemented Interfaces:
Query
public class QueryString
extends java.lang.Object
implements Query
Object that creates a query string that can then be parsed by a QueryParser.

    • getQueryString

      public java.lang.String getQueryString()
      Description copied from interface: Query
      Method used by the Parser for retrieving the text that will be parsed. Typically this need only be the first ~400 characters of content, since that is all that is required in order to generate a sufficient set of n-grams for correctly identifying a language.
      Specified by:
      getQueryString in interface Query
      Returns:
      The string that will be parsed by the QueryParser
